text:
Producer, thank you very much for today,
even though it's late.

Hiori, you're the one who deserves thanks. With the debut live
coming up, make sure to rest properly when you get home.

I understand.
I'm trying to take care of my health.

But before I go...
Could I ask you to listen to me for a moment...?

...Um, for today,
I wanted to thank you, Producer...

For watching over someone like me...
Thank you so much.

Thanks to you, Producer,
I feel like I've started to like myself a little.

Um, sorry for suddenly...!
I just had to tell you before the debut live...

I see... Thank you.
I'm glad to hear that.

Of course, I'm not satisfied yet.
Now that I've taken a step forward, I want to grow even more.

So, Producer...
Please continue to support me from now on...!
